effect.scarlet_violet: Grants the user protection for the rest of the turn. If a Pokémon attempts to use a move that makes contact with the user, that Pokémon will be poisoned. This move’s chance of success halves every time it’s used consecutively with any other protection move.
effect.the_teal_mask: Grants the user protection for the rest of the turn. If a Pokémon attempts to use a move that makes contact with the user, that Pokémon will be poisoned. This move’s chance of success halves every time it’s used consecutively with any other protection move.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Grants the user protection for the rest of the turn. If a Pokémon attempts to use a move that makes contact with the user, that Pokémon will be poisoned. This move’s chance of success halves every time it’s used consecutively with any other protection move.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Grants the user protection for the rest of the turn and poisons any Pokémon that tries to use a contact move on it.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Grants the user protection for the rest of the turn and poisons any Pokémon that tries to use a contact move on it.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Grants the user protection for the rest of the turn and poisons any Pokémon that tries to use a contact move on it.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also poisons any attacker that makes direct contact.
